content: --स्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} (<ab>lit.</ab>) situated on a bank or declivity. {2} (<ab>fig.</ab>) standing aloof, neutral, indifferent, alien, passive; तटस्थः स्वानर्थान् घटयति च मौनं च भजते <ls>Māl. 1. 14</ls>; तटस्थं नैराश्यात् <ls>U. 3. 13</ls>; मया तष्टस्थस्त्वमुपद्रुतोसि <ls>N. 3. 55</ls> (where तटस्थ has sense 1. also). (--स्थः an indifferent person, one neither a friend nor a foe. (--स्थं that property or लक्षण of a thing which is distinct from its nature, and yet is the property by which it is known; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} गंधवत्त्व in the case of पृथ्वी.
